          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection in two mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion in zwei Spiegeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion dans des deux miroirs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão em dois espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione in due specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση σε δύο καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión en dos espejos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that reflected light crosses the incident light if the angle between two mirrors is less than 90 degrees.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß reflektierte helle 
Kreuze das Ereignislicht, wenn der Winkel zwischen zwei Spiegeln 
kleiner als 90 Grad ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les croix légères
reflétées la lumière d'incident si l'angle entre deux miroirs est 
moins de 90 degrés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que cruzes claras 
refletidas a luz do incident se o ângulo entre dois espelhos for 
menos de 90 graus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che traverse chiare 
riflesse la luce di avvenimento se l'angolo fra due specchi è di più
meno di 90 gradi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το απεικονισμένο φως 
διασχίζει το συναφές φως εάν η γωνία μεταξύ δύο καθρεφτών 
είναι λιγότερο από 90 βαθμοί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las cruces ligeras 
reflejadas la luz del incidente si el ángulo entre dos espejos es 
menos de 90 grados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
